<style>
body {
background-image: url('/ded37c1c-94e3-4123-ba38-f7805a8c86ad.jpg') ;
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-position: center middle;
font-size:14px;
color:#000;
font-family: Arial;
overflow:hidden !important;
}

.login_input {
font-size:20px !important;
color:#000;
}

.login_submit {
background-image: url('/fb30b33b-7666-41d0-ad43-5447608cf1cc.png') ;
background-repeat: no-repeat;
width:112px;
height:34px;
border:0px;
cursor:pointer;
}
.login_submit:hover {
background-image: url('/779d9677-8786-4dec-842d-32410f1d7135.png') ;
background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
.version {
	color:#999 !important;
	}

</style>
